directions.step:
This recipe can be divided into 2 dozen pieces and shaped into rolls.
Place in a square pan with rolls touching and sprinkle with oats. Let rise for 1 1/2 to 2 hours and bake in a preheated 425 degree oven for 10 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375 degrees and bake for 15 to 20 minutes.
BAKERS' DOZEN AMY SCHERBER SHOW #BD1A53
